definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
to make a terrible scene (idiom)/to throw a tantrum

definition: to puff up/to swell up/to inflate/to blow air into sth/(fig.) to encourage/to support
lit. as drunk as mud/completely drunk
all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world

definition: to leak (of air)/to go flat (of a tire)/to vent one's anger
